I have to go but after you finish removing fglrx (uninstall fglrx packages and look for an uninstall script in /usr/share/ati if you used a .run file to install it) then reinstall libgl1-mesa-glx and -dri, remove /etc/X11/xorg.conf and then something like xrandr --output VGA-0 --mode 1024x768 --output LVDS --mode 1024x768 --right-of VGA-0
